sentences.en: An inner bridge B of a cycle C in G is transferable.
sentences.cn: G中圈C的内桥B称为可移动的.

sentences.en: At their request, payment may also be made in transferable currencies.
sentences.cn: 在他们的要求下, 也可以用可变换通货交付.

sentences.en: Discounted tickets are usually nonrefundable and non - transferable.
sentences.cn: 打折的票不退款也不可以转到别的班次.

sentences.en: Fees and places allocated on courses are not transferable.
sentences.cn: 除不获取录或取消课程外,学费恕不退还.

sentences.en: One pre - condition for transferability is the pricing for such non - transferable shares.
sentences.cn: 解决全流通问题的前提是如何给 非 流通股定价.

sentences.en: Pollution credits , for example, could be traded if fishermen had transferable quotas.
sentences.cn: 然而促进可持续性的衍生品可以被设计出来.

sentences.en: She had given all that was transferable of her past into my keeping.
sentences.cn: 她已经把她过去所有可以转移的东西都交给我保存了.

sentences.en: The transferable preference shares refer to those convertible into ordinary shares.
sentences.cn: 可调换优先股指可换成普通股的优先股.

sentences.en: This amount is non - refundable and transferable at the discretion of management.
sentences.cn: 这部分金额是否则能退还或转移他用由管理层酌情考虑.

sentences.en: Tickets are transferable between members of the same family.
sentences.cn: 票证可转给家庭成员使用.

sentences.en: Transferable skills are not your secret weapon.
sentences.cn: 可convert的技能是你的秘密武器.

sentences.en: Undergraduate transferable University of California credit given for advanced and professional levels.
sentences.cn: 上高级程度课程或专业程度课程的学生可取得受认可的加州大学课程学分.

sentences.en: Use the transferable skills acquired from your previous working background.
sentences.cn: 先前工作中学到的技能能为现在所用的就多加利用。

sentences.en: What types of leadership skills not transferable between contexts?
sentences.cn: 有那些领导技巧不是这两种职务之间可以通用的?

words.tran_cn: 可转移的；可传递的；可转换的
受让人；承让人；被调任者

trans.tran_cn: 可转让的，可流通的，可传递的，可转移的
trans.tran_en: If something is transferable, it can be passed or moved from one person or organization to another and used by them
